Subject: A message to VorbIss, The D.E.D ships secret.
Message-ID: <3B82B0A9.15478.2704233@localhost>
Priority: normal
X-mailer: Pegasus Mail for Win32 (v3.12c)

As Havotron entered his base, the ships secret finally revealed 
itself.  The moment he stepped in the ship spoke.  

"Welcome back Lord Havok (Authors note: Lord Havok is Havotron 
jsut a shorter and less tacky name)  I have recieved a message 
from a rouge, seemingly factionless, bot, or bots,  shall I respond?"

Havok continued walking down a hall to his main chamber.  As he 
walked lights turned on where he was and off when he left, saving 
energy.

He stepped into his chamber and sat in his thone.  Two balls arose 
from the sides, Havok placing his hands on them.  The two balls 
glew with energy as Havotron was refilled.  Holographic images 
arose in front of him, showing the earth.  

"Focus on this new, spark."

"Yes master" 

The holograph of the earth zoomed in showing only a portion of 
land, a pod there, and the wierd shifting of this bots body.

"Contact him immediatly, Phebus.  His skill, and abnormality is 
invaluable."

"Right away." Phebus, the ship, returned.  
----------------------------------

Wherever ZorbIss was a message was sent to him.  

"Zorb and Iss, my anme is Phebus, the intellegence module of The 
Decepticons for Earths Demise, and or Domination's ship.  My 
leader requests a audience with you.  You will be a welcome 
addition to our ranks.  Follow these coordinates where we will have 
escorts to meet you."

Coordinates to the tip of India were sent to the bot.
-----------

Back in the D.E.D ship Phebus spoke again.

"The message has been sent my lord."

"Good, send Spinister to me"
----
In the common room, a small floting optical sensor floted through 
the room.  Finally finding Spinister.  "Lord Havok would like to see 
you General."
